title: Gold 3 but shielded from demotion?
body:
Seriously why does this never go away. It's been here ever since the start of preseason and it refuses to disappear regardless of how many games I win.

In my last twenty games I have 75% winrate.

In the last 40 its 58%

In all the games since preseason its 50W and 46L (52% winrate)

I thought making it to Gold 3 would finally get rid of it but I still have the icon saying I've lost too many games.

Its honestly really annoying to be winning a lot of games but still have 15-17LP per win and 20-23LP per loss

replies.body: you have a high lp loss% because yopu're not meant to be in gold low lp per win high lp per loss is called climbing out if your average/normal rank of what you are so thats a good thing

No this isn't correct, if he doesn't belong in Gold than he would have a negative win/loss ratio of Lp or when you reach the highest leagues (which also have been thinned out with the introduction of grandmaster for example.

The example OP is giving is actually wierd because I have a similar win ration (52/53%) and I gain 20  lp and lose 19lp  which is what make sense because having a win% of >50% should naturally push you towards an higher division or league if you keep the same ratio of w/l. 

I've seen this issue being brought up and what some players commented is that RIOT is aware of this and won't do anything to fix it because like you said this is the preseason so it doesn't matter much (which is completely false because the mmr in which you end the preseason can largely dictate the rank that you get after the placement matches...)
